pages.index: Experience the Thrilling World of Fantasy Cricket in India with Cricket Zone. Home About Us How to play Latest updates Reviews Download App Build your team and win championships with Cricket Zone GET APP LINK Possibility of transfers Frequent updates Simple rules About Us Fantasy Cricket is a new and exciting format of cricket that has become popular among cricket fans in India. This format allows participants to create their own teams of real players and compete against each other in virtual tournaments. Fantasy cricket gives fans the opportunity to feel like real team managers, make important decisions and win rewards for their efforts. Our website Cricket Zone offers a unique fantasy cricket experience. We provide players with the opportunity to create their own teams, participate in various tournaments and competitions, follow the results and interact with other participants. We offer a wide range of players from different teams and leagues, which allows our participants to create unique and strategic teams. On our website, you will find a lot of useful information about fantasy cricket, rules and strategies of the game, as well as the latest news from the world of cricket. We also provide player statistics, past performance and form, which helps participants make more informed decisions while composing their teams. We aim to create an exciting and engaging fantasy cricket community in India where all fans of this sport can enjoy the game, compete with each other and improve their skills. We conduct regular tournaments and competitions where participants can win attractive prizes and awards. Join us at Cricket Zone and become a part of the exciting world of fantasy cricket. Our doors are open to all who love this amazing sport and want to test themselves in a new format of the game. Participate, compete, win â€“ we are waiting for you on our website! How to play Building Virtual Teams On the Dreamland Cricket Fantasy website, users can build virtual teams of professional cricketers. Each player has a certain value and participants are given a certain budget to buy players. Players can choose players based on their statistics, form, and expected performance in upcoming matches. Participating in Tournaments After building a virtual team, users can participate in various tournaments organized on the Dreamland Cricket Fantasy website. Tournaments can be either daily or long-term, with the opportunity to win prizes for success in the tournaments. Participants can compete with each other and prove their ability to build successful teams. Predicting Match Results In addition to participating in team building and tournaments, users can also participate in predicting match results. They can make their predictions on match outcomes, scores, top scorers, and other statistics. Predictions can be made for individual matches as well as entire tournaments, which adds excitement and competition among participants. Follow Real Events Dreamland Cricket Fantasy provides users with the opportunity to follow real matches, player statistics, and other events in the world of cricket. This allows participants to stay updated with the latest news and trends in the world of cricket and use this information to improve their virtual teams. Opportunity to Win Prizes Participating in games on Dreamland Cricket Fantasy can also provide participants with the opportunity to win various prizes. Depending on the tournament, the placement of participants, and other factors, winners can receive cash prizes, gifts, or other rewards. This creates an additional incentive for participants and makes the gaming process more exciting. Updates and New Features Dreamland Cricket Fantasy is constantly being updated and offers new opportunities for participants. This may include new tournaments, features, player statistics, prizes, and more. Players can stay updated with the latest changes and continue enjoying the game of cricket with new opportunities and challenges. Overall, playing on the Dreamland Cricket Fantasy website provides players with an engaging and exciting experience that brings together cricket lovers from all over the world. Participating in virtual team building, participating in tournaments, predicting match results, strategic planning, and social interaction make the gaming experience fun and interesting. Users can enjoy cricket, improve their skills, and have a chance to win prizes by playing on the Dreamland Cricket Fantasy website. Last 5 updates 1. New Tournament Feature Added. We have added a new feature to the Cricket Zone app - now you can participate in various tournaments and competitions. Choose your favorite tournament, join a team and fight for victory! Tournaments of various difficulty levels are available for all players, regardless of level and experience. Join exciting competitions and show your talent in the game! May 16, 2024 2. Improved Training System. Cricket Zone now offers improved training options. Choose a workout at your discretion, work on your skills and improve your game. The improved training system will help you become a stronger and more successful player in the world of cricket. Don't miss the opportunity to improve your skills and reach new heights! March 11, 2024 3. New Teams and Players Added. We are constantly expanding the list of teams and players in the Cricket Zone app. Now you can choose your favorite team from the new list of added teams and compete with the best players in the world. New players with unique skills and characteristics are available for selection, which makes the game even more interesting and diverse. Meet new teams and players to win important matches and tournaments! January 10, 2024 4. Improved graphics and animation. To enhance the quality of the gameplay, we have improved the graphics and animation in the Cricket Zone application. Now the game looks even more colorful and realistic, which makes the gameplay more exciting and fun. Enjoy beautiful views of the playing fields, smooth animations of player actions and realistic effects while playing in the world of cricket. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a real match and enjoy the game! December 25, 2023 5. Added multiplayer support. Now you have the opportunity to play in multiplayer mode in the Cricket Zone application. Invite your friends or compete with random opponents from around the world. Fight for victory, demonstrate your skills and become the best player in multiplayer mode. Play exciting matches with other players and show your skills in the Cricket Zone game! September 5, 2023 Visualization of the application on the phone 1. Open Google Play Store on your Android device and type "Fantasy Cricket" in the search bar. Find the "Fantasy Cricket Zone" app and click the "Install" button. 2. If you are using an iPhone, open the App Store and type "Fantasy Cricket" in the search bar. Find the "Fantasy Cricket Zone" app and click the "Install" button. 3. Once the Fantasy Cricket Zone app is installed, open it on your device and follow the on-screen instructions to register. Now you can create your teams, participate in games and win prizes. Reviews Sara "A great app for cricket fans! All the latest news, stats and fixtures are here. The user-friendly interface and fast loading times make the app a pleasure to use." Ashwin "A very useful app for anyone who follows Indian cricket. The many features including predictions, live updates and analytics make it one of the best in its class. Highly recommended!" Kavita "Fantasy Cricket Zone is a great way to support your love for the game by creating your team and participating in fantasy leagues. A great choice for all cricket fans!" pages.policy: Privacy Policy of Fantasy Cricket website Cricket Zone in India: safeguarding your data is our top priority. Home About Us How to play Latest updates Reviews Download App Privacy Policy At Cricket Zone, we are committed to protecting the privacy and security of our users. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our Fantasy Cricket app in India. By using Cricket Zone, you agree to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy. Information Collection and Use When you use Cricket Zone, we may collect certain information from you in order to provide you with our services. This information may include: - Personal information such as your name, email address, and phone number - Location information - Device information such as your device type, operating system, and IP address - Usage information such as your interactions with the app, including the matches you participate in and the team selections you make We may collect this information through various methods, including when you create an account, participate in contests, or interact with our app in any way. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect from you for the following purposes: - To provide you with our services, including processing your transactions and enabling you to participate in contests - To personalize your experience on Cricket Zone, including providing you with relevant content and recommendations - To communicate with you, including sending you updates, notifications, and promotional offers - To improve our app and services, including analyzing user behavior and preferences We may also use your information for other purposes with your consent or as required by law. Data Security At Cricket Zone, we take data security seriously. We implement a variety of security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. These measures include encryption, password protection, and restricted access to your information within our organization. However, please note that no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. Data Sharing and Disclosure We may share your personal information with third parties in the following circumstances: - With service providers who help us operate our app and provide our services - With partners who offer contests and promotions on Cricket Zone - With law enforcement authorities or other government agencies as required by law We will not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties for their marketing purposes without your consent. Third-Party Links Cricket Zone may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by us. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third parties. We recommend that you review the privacy policies of these third parties before providing them with your personal information. Children's Privacy Cricket Zone is not intended for children under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If you believe that we have inadvertently collected information from a child under 18, please contact us immediately so that we can delete the information. Changes to this Privacy Policy We reserve the right to update or change this Privacy Policy at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. It is your responsibility to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at cricketzone@gmail.com. Please participate responsibly and be aware of your own limits. Our platform does not carry confidentiality and risks. 18+
pages.terms: Terms and Conditions of Use for Fantasy Cricket site Cricket Zone in India. Account Registration In order to use the Cricket Zone app, you may be required to create an account. You agree to provide accurate and complete information during the registration process. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and password. 4. Intellectual Property All content on the Cricket Zone app, including logos, graphics, and text, is our intellectual property and may not be used without our permission. You may not modify, reproduce, or distribute any content from the app without our consent. 8. Disclaimers The Cricket Zone app is provided on an "as is" basis, without any warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee that the app will be error-free or uninterrupted. We are not responsible for any losses or damages that result from your use of the app. 9. Limitation of Liability In no event shall Cricket Zone or its affiliates be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with your use of the app. 10. Changes to Terms We reserve the right to modify or update these Terms of Use at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting to the app. It is your responsibility to review these terms regularly. 11. Governing Law These Terms of Use are governed by the laws of India. Any disputes arising out of or relating to these terms will be resolved by the courts in India. 12. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms of Use, please contact us at cricketzone@gmail.com. By using the Cricket Zone app, you agree to abide by these Terms of Use. Thank you for choosing Cricket Zone for your fantasy cricket needs! pages.cookies: Cookies Policy for the Cricket Zone website of Fantasy Cricket in India. Home About Us How to play Latest updates Reviews Download App Cookies Policy This Cookies Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and how you can manage your cookie preferences for the Cricket Zone fantasy cricket app in India. What are cookies? Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They are used to collect information about your browsing behavior and preferences, and to help personalize your online experience. How we use cookies We use cookies for the following purposes: 1. Essential cookies: These cookies are necessary for the app to function properly. They enable basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the app. 2. Performance cookies: These cookies help us understand how you interact with the app by collecting information about your usage patterns. This helps us improve the performance and usability of the app. 3. Functionality cookies: These cookies are used to remember your preferences and settings, such as language and location, to enhance your user experience. 4. Advertising cookies: These cookies are used to deliver personalized ads based on your interests and browsing history. They also help us measure the effectiveness of our advertising campaigns. Managing your cookie preferences You can manage your cookie preferences by adjusting the settings in your browser. Most browsers allow you to block or delete cookies, or to set preferences for certain types of cookies, such as third-party cookies. Please note that blocking or deleting cookies may affect your user experience on the app, and some features may not work properly. Changes to this Cookies Policy We may update this Cookies Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. Please check this page regularly for updates. Contact us If you have any questions about this Cookies Policy, please contact us at cricketzone@gmail.com. By using the Cricket Zone fantasy cricket app, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with this Cookies Policy. Thank you for choosing Cricket Zone!
